sentence.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development1, an important member of the Kank gene family, plays an important role in the development of many malignant tumors.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: As a brand new tumor-suppressor gene, the expression of negative regulation of neuron projection development1 gene has been revealed to be downregulated or absent in many malignant tumors.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: However, there is no study concerning the specific role of negative regulation of neuron projection development1 in the development and progression of lung cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: In the present study, we found that the negative regulation of neuron projection developmentl gene was significantly downregulated in human lung cancer and lung cancer cells.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: When the negative regulation of neuron projection developmentl gene was upregulated, we found that the proliferation of lung cancer cells was significantly inhibited, the cells were arrested in the G0/G1 phase, the apoptosis of cells was observed, the expression of the caspase family of genes was altered with mainly the activation of caspase-3 and -9, and Bcl-2/Bax ratio was significantly imbalanced.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: In addition, we also found that upregulation of the negative regulation of neuron projection developmentl gene resulted in the inhibition of tumor cell invasion and metastasis.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: Concurrently, in vivo establishment of mitotic spindle orientation apoptotic process experiments also confirmed that upregulation of negative regulation of neuron projection development1 expression led to reduced tumor formation in nude mice and significantly reduced tumor volume.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: These results revealed that upregulation of the negative regulation of neuron projection developmentl gene inhibited the progression of lung cancer both in vitro and in vivo, and its mechanism was closely related to cell apoptosis as well as tumor invasion and metastasis

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development
